Make every round memorable! ⛳ Our '19th Hole Golf Personalized Sign' adds a dash of personal pride to your favorite golfing spot, highlighting your family's name and cherished location. 📍

Why Tailored Canvases?

1️⃣  Personalization: Turn your favorite memories into beautiful, unique pieces of art that can be cherished for a lifetime.

2️⃣ Museum-Quality Printing: Display your photos and artwork in stunning detail, with sharp images and vivid colors that will make your memories come alive.

3️⃣ Customizable Sizes & Styles: Get the perfect fit for your space, to create a truly personalized and cohesive look in your home or office.

4️⃣ Durable & Long-Lasting: Protect your cherished memories with a canvas that is built to last, resisting damage and fading over time.

5️⃣ Over 18,579 Five-Star Reviews: Join the thousands of satisfied customers who trust us to turn their memories into lasting works of art.

Our canvases are:

✅ 100% American-Made Quality: Proudly support American craftsmanship with a custom canvas print that's made in the USA with the highest standards of quality.

✅ Premium 1.5" Thick Canvas: Enjoy lasting beauty with a canvas that's 10x more durable than standard options, providing long-lasting protection for your cherished memories.

✅ UV-Resistant Ink for Decades of Vibrant Color: Display your photos and artwork with confidence, with UV-resistant ink that prevents fading and deterioration over time.

✅ Customized to Your Exact Specification: Get a perfect fit for your space and your style, with a custom canvas print that's made just for you based on your specifications.

✅ Free & Fast Shipping: ﻿Get your custom canvas print delivered to your door with ease, with free and fast shipping via FedEx.

Get‌ ‌a‌ ‌premium‌ ‌home‌ ‌decor‌ ‌piece‌ ‌that’s‌ ‌specially‌ ‌made‌ ‌for‌ ‌you when you order a customized cattle ranch wall decor from Tailored Canvases.‌ ‌‌Click‌ ‌the‌ ‌‘ADD‌ ‌TO‌ ‌CART’‌ button‌ ‌and‌ ‌get an initial proof in 24 hours!

Add a vintage twist to your coffee bar with the grounded warmth of our coffee bar canvas sign. Whether you place it on the walls of your coffee business location or your kitchen at home, this coffee bar canvas print will add a touch of rustic elegance to your atmosphere. You can customize it with your name, business logo, or a poem to remind you of your love for coffee.

Either way, a coffee wall art piece will surely add some brown and grounding feelings to your surroundings.

  • 100% made in the US using 1.5” thick premium canvas - So you can dazzle your guests - Every time.
  • UV-resistant ink is used to print the designs to make them last for decades - so your compliments will never fade. - so your compliments will never fade.
  • These coffee bar signs are custom-made just for you. Get it with your family name, or change the other text to something that suits you - so YOUR home will tell YOUR family story.
  • suits you - so YOUR home will tell YOUR family story.

This unique sign is perfect for your local business and home interiors. Don't settle for an ordinary mass-made sign - Order your custom coffee bar wall decor today! Fill in your details and click the "ADD TO CART" button to start your order.
